    Paper Notes

    This is where I have put my notes on various papers and books, these may not be as helpful as my general topic notes, but might be useful to someone! Throughout these notes, parts that are written in red font are notes to myself so take these with a grain of salt.

    Reflectionless quantum transport

    Glazmann et al - JETP Letters 1989

    More Info

    Egger and Grabert

    These are three papers released in quick succession by Egger and Grabert that look at the problem of Luttinger Liquids and applying bias across them. These set of papers introduce the radiative boundary conditions which have become a standard way to deal with non-equilibrium wires.

    Applying voltage sources to Luttinger Liquid

    Egger and Grabert - Phys Rev B 1998

    More Info

    Electroneutrality in a Luttinger Liquid

    Egger and Grabert - Phys Rev Lett 1997
